summary: Lol they really had Tyrion arguing that a literal sociopath should be King. Bran has no personality, no emotion, no empathy, no...
body: Lol they really had Tyrion arguing that a literal sociopath should be King. Bran has no personality, no emotion, no empathy, no feelings whatsoever. Like D&D really thought this was a good plan. They really thought everyone would realistically be like “ya Bran should be King bc obviously the number 1 best trait of any ruler is ambivalence.” What a joke.

reblog.comment: Lol they really had Tyrion arguing that a literal sociopath should be King. Bran has no personality, no emotion, no empathy, no feelings whatsoever. Like D&D really thought this was a good plan. They really thought everyone would realistically be like “ya Bran should be King bc obviously the number 1 best trait of any ruler is ambivalence.” What a joke.

Like D&D really thought this was a good plan. They really thought everyone would realistically be like “ya Bran should be King bc obviously the number 1 best trait of any ruler is ambivalence.” What a joke.

Like D&D really thought this was a good plan. They really thought everyone would realistically be like “ya Bran should be King bc obviously the number 1 best trait of any ruler is ambivalence.” What a joke.

summary: After disrespecting Bran for like half the show, destroying his character and erasing his personality, downplaying his...
body: After disrespecting Bran for like half the show, destroying his character and erasing his personality, downplaying his relationships with his friends and family, sidelining him and not using his hard earned abilities…. they make him king as part of their “subverting expectations uwu” twist ending…. and we’re supposed to celebrate? I have to laugh

reblog.comment: After disrespecting Bran for like half the show, destroying his character and erasing his personality, downplaying his relationships with his friends and family, sidelining him and not using his hard earned abilities…. they make him king as part of their “subverting expectations uwu” twist ending…. and we’re supposed to celebrate? I have to laugh

trail.content_raw: After disrespecting Bran for like half the show, destroying his character and erasing his personality, downplaying his relationships with his friends and family, sidelining him and not using his hard earned abilities…. they make him king as part of their “subverting expectations uwu” twist ending…. and we’re supposed to celebrate? I have to laugh
trail.content: After disrespecting Bran for like half the show, destroying his character and erasing his personality, downplaying his relationships with his friends and family, sidelining him and not using his hard earned abilities…. they make him king as part of their “subverting expectations uwu” twist ending…. and we’re supposed to celebrate? I have to laugh

blog.name: hexthewriter
blog.title: Untitled Heroine
blog.description: Nombre: Amensha/Hex.  Code of Conduct: No IRL socio-political discourse (entertainment is okay, too much can get tiresome fast though), I did enough of that in my undergrad. No taking fandoms so seriously you ruin it for everyone else. Chill out. Have a ball. Talk to me about writing. Laugh at my bad art. Have a good time. Ingest guacamoley for your souley.

summary: Here’s a little WIP of our 3ER. Brandon Stark.  i imagined....what Bran looked like, having to watch what happened to Sansa I...
caption:
Here’s a little WIP of our 3ER. Brandon Stark. 

i imagined….what Bran looked like, having to watch what happened to Sansa
I realise he is bereft of a lot of his humanity as 3ER
but i dont want to believe it’s all of it
and i imagine the burden of all the worlds knowledge is a heavy one

Here’s to Bran the Bird <3 

“I’m going to go now,” - Brandon Stark.

im taking my crumbs and running with it
summary: the 2nd best thing, after sansa’s coronation ofc, was the house tully cook-out at the dragonpits where sweetrobin showed off the...
body: the 2nd best thing, after sansa’s coronation ofc, was the house tully cook-out at the dragonpits where sweetrobin showed off the benefits of tiddy milk in his post-puberty glow-up, bumbling uncle edmure trying and failing to be hip and cool to the mortification of his nieces and nephews, sansa and arya nearly starting a civil war in an attempt to break their war-criminal cousin out of jail and bran finnessing himself an entire continent by being dedicated to his local cryptid persona for 8 years. catelyn and house tully are the true winners of game of thrones.

reblog.comment: the 2nd best thing, after sansa’s coronation ofc, was the house tully cook-out at the dragonpits where sweetrobin showed off the benefits of tiddy milk in his post-puberty glow-up, bumbling uncle edmure trying and failing to be hip and cool to the mortification of his nieces and nephews, sansa and arya nearly starting a civil war in an attempt to break their war-criminal cousin out of jail and bran finnessing himself an entire continent by being dedicated to his local cryptid persona for 8 years. catelyn and house tully are the true winners of game of thrones.

summary:
So I guess Bran is just going to pass the Three Eyed Raven powers on to his successor?
If thats the case, especially since he...
body:
So I guess Bran is just going to pass the Three Eyed Raven powers on to his successor?

If thats the case, especially since he isn’t really Bran anymore, couldn’t he be His Grace, the Three-Eyed Raven instead of Bran the Broken? And Three Eyed Raven could, over time, replace King or Queen as the title of the figurehead of the Six Kingdoms.

reblog.comment:
